## DropdownItem interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DropdownItem 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [element](./ui-dropdown.dropdownitem.element.md) | <code>ReactNode</code> | An optional element which can be rendered in place of the label when provided. |
|  [id](./ui-dropdown.dropdownitem.id.md) | <code>string</code> | A unique identifier for this item.<!-- -->This is also used as the key. |
|  [label](./ui-dropdown.dropdownitem.label.md) | <code>string</code> | The string label to render for the dropdown |
